description: Gilmar Madrid Río ( ) puts at your disposal this unique and exclusive home in one of the best areas of Parla, Las Américas. Located in a completely new urbanization with a modern construction with a communal pool, children's playground and green areas, the house has 2 floors and a constructed area of about 260m², of which 100m² correspond to a garden, it also has a private parking with capacity for 2 cars and 2 motorcycles. The construction materials are excellent and with high quality and details such as ducted air conditioning with an air purification machine and underfloor heating. The interior carpentry is finished in white lacquer and the interior doors look to match the cabinets, the contrasting floor shows off a very nice Nordic-style wood tone. The exterior carpentry is made of lacquered aluminum with double glazed windows with low thermal emission. Distribution: Main floor: Large hall with built-in wardrobe that distributes access to the kitchen and living room and the access staircase to the basement. From the living room there is access to the patio and the garden area and from the kitchen there is access to the clothesline. On this floor we find 3 bedrooms and 2 bathrooms, one of them being a suite, all bedrooms have a large-capacity built-in wardrobe. Basement floor: from the access stairs we reach a distributor that connects a winter room with an English patio and the huge closed parking lot. The area has all the necessary services and just a few steps away we find the Vicente del Bosque sports center, a school, an institute, the health center, the Forus Parla saltwater pool and the Parque del Universo. Communications are good since access to the Toledo motorway (A-42) is very fast, it will take 9 minutes to access the M-50 ring road and 15 to access the M-40. description: Grupo Inmobilia offers this impressive duplex penthouse for sale. The combination of space, amenities and modern technology is very attractive. Here are some reasons why this penthouse could be your home: Space and distribution: With 109 square meters distributed in 3 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, a large living room and a complete kitchen, it offers comfort and functionality for those looking for a well-distributed space. Amazing Terraces: Two terraces are a huge plus! One of 10 meters and another of 80 square meters offer the opportunity to enjoy the outdoors, organize outdoor events or simply relax with a fabulous view. Location and services: Being in a semi-new urbanization from 2008 with a swimming pool, well-maintained common areas and a doorman adds value. Safety and quality maintenance are important aspects for those looking for a place to live. Modern technology: Home automation and aerothermal system are modern features that not only make life more comfortable, but can also be attractive to those interested in living in a smart, energy-efficient space. Luminosity: The spacious living room with lots of light is another strong point, since natural lighting can positively influence the atmosphere of the home. In summary, this duplex penthouse offers a combination of modern amenities, well-distributed space, outdoor areas and services within a well-kept urbanization. Without a doubt, it would be an attractive place for those looking for a home with these characteristics. Located on Cebadero Street, it has a location that will allow you to be close to La Puerta de la Tolerancia and the El Nido Municipal Pavilion. At the same time, it is close to supermarkets, restaurants and parks. The closest train station is Parla (C4). Be sure to visit it, call us requesting a visit.

description: !EMPIRE REAL ESTATE PROPERTIES SELLS MAGNIFICENT HOME IN PARLA! Welcome to your new home in the heart of downtown Parla, a residential gem that combines comfort, elegance and accessibility. This FREE RENT apartment on the third floor is a unique opportunity to live in a carefully designed space, built in 2006, and presented in impeccable condition. From the moment you cross the threshold, you are immersed in a welcoming and bright space. The house, facing east and west, receives abundant natural light throughout the day, creating a warm and comfortable environment. The elevator will comfortably take you to the third floor, eliminating any barrier for those with reduced mobility. The living room, with a rectangular shape and large windows, becomes the epicenter of social life. Its luminosity invites relaxed moments and the view to the outside adds a touch of serenity. This space is the perfect canvas for your everyday moments and meetings with loved ones. The layout of the home includes two bedrooms, both generous in size and equipped with built-in wardrobes to maximize storage space. One of the bedrooms features a bay window offering lovely views outside, whilst the other benefits from an en-suite bathroom, giving you a touch of privacy and comfort. The kitchen, independent and fully furnished, is a place where functionality meets design. Equipped with a modern ceramic hob, it offers you the perfect space to unleash your culinary creativity. Plus, an enclosed clothesline overlooking an interior courtyard adds an extra layer of practicality to your daily life. The bathrooms, one individual and one en-suite, are designed with careful details. The stoneware floor adds a touch of elegance, and the functional layout ensures a hassle-free experience. The home is characterized by its high-quality finishes, such as the white lacquered aluminum exterior carpentry, the oak interior carpentry and the parquet floors that provide warmth and style to every corner, except in the bathrooms where quality stoneware is found. Heating and hot water, both powered by natural gas, guarantee optimal comfort throughout the year. In addition to the armored door that provides additional security, the home includes a square storage room that offers additional storage space. Located in the heart of Parla, the apartment benefits from a quiet neighborhood community and nearby services. From educational and cultural centers to supermarkets, pharmacies and local shops, everything is within your reach. The renovated pedestrian zone and the promenade with wide streets and nearby shops offer a charming environment to stroll and enjoy. Transport communication is excellent, with intercity buses, direct connections to Madrid and proximity to the Renfe Cercanías de Parla C4 station and a tram stop. This apartment is not only a place to live, it is a home where comfort, elegance and accessibility merge to create an exceptional living experience. Welcome to your new home in the center of Parla! COME VISIT YOUR HOME! FINANCING TO YOUR MEASURE COME VISIT YOUR HOME!
